column1: #Text=Long before Prince von der Tann reached Lustadt he had come to the conclusion that Leopold was in virtue a prisoner in Blentz .
#Text=To prove his conclusion he directed one of his staff to return to Blentz and attempt to have audience with the king .
#Text=" Risk anything , " he instructed the officer to whom he had entrusted the mission .
#Text=" Submit , if necessary , to the humiliation of seeking an Austrian pass through the lines to the castle .

#Text= Your majesty , " he cried , " there is a way to unite all factions in Lutha .

column1: #Text=" I am well informed as to the strange obstinacy of the princess , but for the welfare of the state -- yes , for the sake of your very throne , sire -- you should exert your royal prerogatives and command the Princess Emma to carry out the terms of your betrothal .
